title: With STEP, promotions dependent on education, training (The United States Army)
text: ( Source : The United States Army ) WASHINGTON ( Army News Service , Oct. 12, 2015 ) -- The sergeant major of the Army told a roomful of senior noncommissioned officers, or NCOs , today that a 'monumental change' to NCO education and training is
